equipment.name: Ectoplasmic Essence
equipment.description: A bottled otherworldy substance that empowers one with heightened spiritual awareness.

equipment.name: Amulet of Whispers
equipment.description: A silver amulet that murmurs arcane knowledge when the stars align.

equipment.name: Pendant of Feral Instinct
equipment.description: A pendant that enhances the wearer's attunement to their surroundings.

equipment.name: Goblet of the Damned
equipment.description: A goblet crafted from bones, filled with blood that never dries.

equipment.name: Clockwork Heart
equipment.description: A precise mechanical heart that steadies your courage under pressure.

equipment.name: Wraith's Lantern
equipment.description: A dimly glowing lantern that reveals ghostly apparitions and hidden dangers.

equipment.name: Mechanical Spider
equipment.description: This clockwork arachnid can reach the smallest crevices to retrieve lost knowledge.

equipment.name: Orb of Foreknowledge
equipment.description: A glass orb filled with swirling mists that grant clairvoyance.

equipment.name: Shackles of the Tormented
equipment.description: Shackles that bind not only the body but instill a sense of growing despair.

equipment.name: Ring of the Sanguine Pact
equipment.description: A ring set with a deep red stone that thirsts for the blood of the living.

equipment.name: Pendant of the Dread Widow
equipment.description: A pendant made from the fangs of a deadly spider; its presence is deeply unsettling.

equipment.name: Visage of the Hollow
equipment.description: A mask featuring a ghastly, empty visage that fills one's mind with dread.

equipment.name: Chalice of the Eldritch
equipment.description: A chalice with alien carvings; those who drink from it experience unnerving visions.

equipment.name: Bloodied Sacrificial Dagger
equipment.description: Still dripping with the blood of an unknown victim, this dagger inspires dread in foes.

equipment.name: Veil of the Banshee
equipment.description: A translucent cloth that can mask your presence from mortal eyes.

equipment.name: Cursed Grimoire
equipment.description: An ancient book bound in strange leather that whispers secrets of the dark arts.

equipment.name: Mirror of the Abyss
equipment.description: An obsidian mirror that shows things unseen and unspoken.

equipment.name: Spectacles of Second Sight
equipment.description: These glasses allow one to see mystical energies and secrets.

equipment.name: Greaves of Silent Footsteps
equipment.description: These metal greaves emit no sound, allowing silent movement through threats.

equipment.name: Vorpal Dagger
equipment.description: A dagger with a blade that phases through matter, perfect for close encounters with otherworldly entities.

equipment.name: Gauntlet of Thorns
equipment.description: A twisted, spiky gauntlet that injects a potion to bolster the wearer's will.

equipment.name: Skull of Forbidden Echoes
equipment.description: This human skull whispers terrifying secrets from beyond.

equipment.name: Cloak of the Night Stalker
equipment.description: This cloak, woven with darkness, shrouds you in shadow.

equipment.name: Tome of the Blood Moon
equipment.description: A book bound in human flesh that details rituals only to be performed under a blood moon.
